rev.comment: /* Sonic The Comic */ - I already removed this as the source is unverified, why was it stuck back in?
Rm pointless comparison, please stay on topic.

Amy *is* 12. It is officially stated in the Sonic Heroes manual and on Sonic Channel.

rv - The fan thing is unnotable
rm more general categories that are parents/grandpartents of remaining, more specific categories
I looked at the refference link. It never expressed that it would be likeley he would grow attatched to Amy if he ended his fast paced life.
/* Voice actors */ Removed statement for lack of NPOV.
Fixed "family" section grammar, removed dubious fansite reference link
/* Other Abilities */ Typo fix ("boxcersise") and minor corrections.
General cleanup and trim of the second paragraph--Removed extraneous information; corrected grammar.
spelling fixes, tidy, and general cleanup using [[Wikipedia:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
typo fixing bot: just doing a little house cleaning, using [[Wikipedia:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]

Div tags with set width do not need my
tag
Enclosed in div tags to get rid of extraneous spacing
It's best not to speculate. Sorry.
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/70.107.30.215|70.107.30.215]] to last version by UnDeRsCoRe
Stop changing her weight! The information at said source says, in Japanese, "himitsu", which means "secret". Therefore, it is a SECRET, no value attached.

rv all edits to last version by [[Special:Contributions&target=172.148.112.154|172.148.112.154]]
/* Sonic X */ Now that series has finished for the immediate future, the spoilers should apply to someone who hasn't seen the series, so I moved them.
/* Game Appearances */ Added period and wikilink
/* Other Abilities */ clarified the hammerspace as being a theory and added archie comics bit to it
/* Game-specific abilities */ added vault for sa1, misc gram/spell fixes

rv AmyRoseRules - Fans of Amy from 4kids' forums, of all places, is definitely not notable

rm completely unsourced food section; rm "people who like Amy at 4kids forum" bit *shudder*

/* Game-specific abilities */ Added Sonic Advance 3, Sonic Battle, and brief summary text
/* Personality */ rm edit by [[User:82.8.115.189|82.8.115.189]] to last version by [[User:206.109.238.11|206.109.238.11]] because opinion/POV was added to article.
Amy was originally 8 in Sonic CD according to every source I know of.
/* The Love Hammer (AKA Piko Piko Hammer, or Pikopiko Hammer) */ The Piko Piko Hammer has no alternate name...O_o
Reverting anon who removed descriptions and frames for a lot of images
Disambiguate [[Sonic the Hedgehog]] to [[Sonic the Hedgehog (character)]] using [[:en:Wikipedia:Tools/Navigation_popups|popups]]
Fixed up the mess in the top section.
/* The Piko Piko Hammer */ Minor edit for better readability
Removed "Amy Rose Blossom" name--No supporting evidence available.
Deleted reference to Sonic Ultimate. It's a fansite, and the information contained is questionable. Furthermore, there has been no official information released regarding Amy's weight.
/* Love life */ Added name to existing citation
Updated the citations to the new <ref> tag.
/* Other Abilities */ Deleted the section about Amy's bracelets rearranging molecules into hammers or some such nonsense. Completely unofficial, and not even a popular fan theory.

Quoted Naka directly to avoid possible POV.
That's already noted in the Trivia section.
/* Love Life */ Life-->life. Rv earlier unencyclopedic edit by 216.204.196.59.
/* Archie Comics */ fixed link to wrong, non-existing article
RM caps in section headers and/or minor fixes using [[Wikipedia:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
Removed Inappropriate Tone tag with a comment to tell us exactly where it needs fixing in the talk page
Re-adding caption/template that was removed without reason
